Title: Too Much Information
Plot:
Alan and Denise take on the case of a young girl whose father killed her mother after finding the mother's whereabouts through her HMO's website.

Catherine Piper comes back into Alan's life - by robbing convenience stores.

Beverly Bridge, Denny's fianc√©e, flexes her muscle around the firm -- meanwhile, Brad attempts to manage the situation for Shirley and Paul.

Daniel goes in for chemotherapy, and attempts to shut out Denise.
GuestStars: Sharon Omi,  Jeff Bowser,  Regan Burns,  Michael C. Alexander,  Shirley Jordan,  Hildy Brooks,  Kayla Mae Maloney,  Marshall Manesh,  Michael Shamus Wiles,  Mark L. Taylor,  John Aylward,  Ana Ortiz,  Lisa Vidal
